CustomField.description: Indicates if this execution is in tool-terminating mode where the tool result is the final response without follow-up LLM processing. Used for Function agents with 0-1 capabilities where the tool output should be returned directly.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When true, tool results are treated as final responses without additional LLM processing. Used for single-tool function agents.
CustomField.label: Is Tool Terminating Mode
